oracle.pg.rdbms

Class PGUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.rdbms.PGUtils

  • public class PGUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A helpful utility to create property graph views (vertex and edge views) from an RDF model stored in an Oracle Database

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PGUtils.RDFPredicate
      This class defines how to map RDF predicates to property graph attributes/keys

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PGUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createPropertyGraphViewOnRDF(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String pgGraphName, java.lang.String rdfModelName, boolean virtualModel, PGUtils.RDFPredicate[] predListForVertexAttrs, PGUtils.RDFPredicate[] predListForEdges)
      This method creates the property graph views (vertex and edge views) for the given RDF model.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PGUtils

        public PGUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • createPropertyGraphViewOnRDF

        public static void createPropertyGraphViewOnRDF(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                java.lang.String pgGraphName,
                                                java.lang.String rdfModelName,
                                                boolean virtualModel,
                                                PGUtils.RDFPredicate[] predListForVertexAttrs,
                                                PGUtils.RDFPredicate[] predListForEdges)
        This method creates the property graph views (vertex and edge views) for the given RDF model.
        Parameters:
        conn - an connection instance to Oracle database
        pgGraphName - the name of the property graph to be created
        rdfModelName - the name of the RDF model
        virtualModel - a flag represents if the RDF model is virtual model or not
        predListForVertexAttrs - an array of RDFPredicate objects specifying how to create vertex view using these predicates; each RDFPredicate includes an URL of the predicate in RDF model to be treated as a vertex key in the property graph, and the key name to be used.
        predListForEdges - an array of RDFPredicate specifying how to create edge view using these predicates; each RDFPredicate includes an URL of the predicate in RDF model to be treated as an edge, the edge label to be used, and the weight of the edge (optional)
